text: allahu tanre dasanmaril ninn tan icchikkunnavarute mel tanre anugraham irakkikeatukkunnatilulla irsya nimittam allahu avatarippicca sandesatte avisvasikkuka vali tannalute atmakkale virrukeantavar vanniya vila etra citta! annane avar keapattinu mel keapattinu patramayi tirnnu. satyanisedhikalkkatre nindyamaya siksayullatâ€Œ
